name: Physics Conflict
description:
As a rubber ball you are looking for your way through the game. You have to control your ball as well as the property of some physical laws. Solve tricky tasks by pure logic or simply just trials to get ahead.

  • classic platformer Game (Jump n Run)
  • easy control
  • physics simulation
  • completely free and without ads

How to play:

Use your ARROW KEYS to go left and right. Press SPACE to jump and E to interact. Press ESCAPE to make a break.

Please download the Android APP to play more levels!
